events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on the experience and skills you provided.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your Software Engineer application and are impressed with your qualifications.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the technical interview next week; we appreciate your prompt response.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10:00 AM via video call with our engineering lead.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 23rd at 2:00 PM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went smoothly, and we appreciate the engaging conversation about your career goals.
We are excited to propose a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer; we are glad you are enthusiastic about joining our team.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you to the Engineering department.
Your onboarding has begun with access to resources and introductions to your new team members.
The hiring process is now complete, and we look forward to your first day and successful career here.
